description: This file contains code for initializing a document knowledge base with sample DOCX files, setting up a vector database, and querying the knowledge base with filters, including sample code for agent-based querying.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving document embeddings.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base built from DOCX documents, supporting document loading and metadata filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class for interacting with the knowledge base, capable of performing searches and generating responses based on filters.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample DOCX files for testing knowledge filters.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a document into the knowledge base with associated metadata.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on a query.
